TextView.android:text: State the problem you are solving *
Specify the disadvantages of the invention *
State your proposed solution to the problem *
Describe the methodology of your invention Design *
Specify the advantages of the invention *
Has the date of conception of invention been documented in a laboratory notebook (or other documents)?*
Did you search for previous disclosures by others of similar inventions (for example did you carry out a search for prior art patents)?*
Have you made a prototype of your invention or practiced your invention?*
Were there any prior public disclosure(s) or are there any anticipated disclosure(s), either written or oral, of the Invention?*
